column2: select a.artistid, a.name, s.value   from chinook.artist a cross apply STRING_SPLIT(a.name,&&&) s ) select a1.artistid as id1, a2.artistid as id2, count(a2.value) as num ,   max(a1.name) as name1, max(a2.name) as name2   from asplit a1     inner join asplit a2       on a1.artistid != a2.artistid     and a1.value=a2.value group by id1,id2
